content_long:
Microwave Frigidaire FGBM19WNVF ‚Äì 110V ‚Äì with integrated hood

Thanks to its generous capacity of 34 litres and its power of 1000 watts, this model guarantees fast, homogeneous and silent cooking. Its touch electronic controls, clear digital display and automatic programs make it easy to prepare all your dishes on a daily basis.

The elegant and resistant stainless steel finish fits perfectly into modern or professional kitchens. Designed for local electrical installations, this microwave operates in 110 volts, ideal for homes in Sint Maarten and the Caribbean.
